directions: Fill a pitcher with ice. Add beer, orange juice, vodka, gin, rum, tequila, and triple sec; stir gently. Fill tall glasses with ice. Pour drink mixture into each glass. Top each drink off with cola-flavored beverage.
ingredients: 4 fluid ounces beer (such as Miller® High Life®)
3 fluid ounces cola-flavored carbonated beverage (such as Coca-Cola®), or more as needed
title: Hilton Head Iced Tea
